text: The David di Donatello Award is a film award. It is presented each year by L'accademia del Cinema Italiano (ACI). There are 24 categories as of 2006. ==Trophy== The trophy is a gold David statuette like Donatello's famous sculpture. It is on a square malachite base. A gold plaque shows the award category, year and winner. The 1956 David awarded to Gina Lollobrigida for Beautiful but Dangerous was auctioned at Sothebys in 2013. ==References== == Other websites == * Official website * David di Donatello Awards at Internet Movie Database Category:Movie awards Category:Italian movies Category:1955 establishments in Europe Category:1950s establishments in Italy
